Participation Service¶

class events.services.participation.ParticipationService¶

Bases: object

static get_all_by_id(id: int) → django.db.models.query.QuerySet¶
static get_all_participation_in_event(event_id: int) → django.db.models.query.QuerySet¶

Service method used to get all the “participants” of an Event

Parameters

event_id – the primary key “ID” of an Event

Returns

a set of all the Participation model objects

static user_part_of_event(user_id: int, event_id: int) → bool¶

Service method used to check whether a specific User has joined an a specific Event

Parameters

  • user_id – the primary key “ID” of a User

  • event_id – the primary key “ID” of an Event

Returns

boolean False if the object is NULL / else True
